SEARCH
Package org.example.view

Class ViewTUI

java.lang.Object
org.example.view.View
org.example.view.ViewTUI
public class ViewTUI extends View
Text User Interface (TUI) version of the game view. This class handles displaying the game state and interacting with the user via the console.
